attributes.action: remove the right of police to obscure their identity whilst policing demonstrations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this  creates an air of intimidation and menace towards  demonstrators and heightens tensions thus resulting in police brutality and infringements on  civil liberties.the police were ramping up the pressure and created the trouble with their disgracefull tactics which were captured on camera again maybe justice this time in police state britain
